meta.name: Campus Academic
meta.description: 学术校园风格，墨绿配色，适合论文分享、学术交流

base.container: background-color: #fffbf0; color: #2c3e50; font-family: 'Georgia', 'Songti SC', serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.85; padding: 28px;

header_window.style: background-color: #1b4d3e; border: 2px solid #1b4d3e; border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0; padding: 12px 24px; margin-bottom: 32px;

headings.h2: color: #1b4d3e; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 32px 0 18px; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 2px solid #1b4d3e; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
headings.h3: color: #2c5f54; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; margin: 24px 0 12px; font-style: italic;
headings.h1: color: #1b4d3e; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 32px 0 18px; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 2px solid #1b4d3e; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #e8f5e9; color: #1b4d3e; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 2px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #1b4d3e; color: #a8d5ba; padding: 18px; border-radius: 4px; margin: 20px 0; font-size: 13px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #f0f9f4; border-left: 4px solid #1b4d3e; color: #1b4d3e; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 18px 0; font-style: italic;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fdf2f2; border-left: 4px solid #8b3a3a; color: #8b3a3a; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 18px 0; font-style: italic;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #f0f9f4; border: 1px solid #1b4d3e; color: #1b4d3e; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; font-style: italic;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 48px; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 1px solid #1b4d3e; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
